name: arxy/entity-translations-bundle
description: This bundle provides translations for entities in your project. It's a bundle, but can be used standalone.

suggest.symfony/symfony: Needed for easy integration into Symfony
suggest.twig/twig: Needed to use Twig Extension to translate in twig.
suggest.symfony/property-access: Needed for Twig extension to translate
suggest.symfony/translation: Needed if you want to use Symfony Translation's configuration. Otherwise this bundle should be setup separately.
suggest.symfony/form: Needed if you want to use forms to translate entities.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: Needed if you want to use forms to translate entities.
